title: 1 Bedroom Apartments - Welcome Home :)
neighborhood: Old Brooklyn, Off of Broadview Rd
posting_body: ['Broadview Gardens Apartments', '1907 Pleasantdale Rd #4', 'Cleveland, Ohio 44109', 'Welcome to Broadview Gardens Apartments, a place where you can call home.', 'Close to many freeway access points including I-176 & I-480!', ' There is ample free parking and we are also on the 51 bus line.', ' We provide secured entry and intercoms.', 'You will also find a reliable laundry facility and extra storage units in each building for your convenience.', 'Some of our many other features include:', '24 hour emergency maintenance', 'Sunny corner suites', 'Resident referral program', 'Convenient office hours', 'Playground', 'Park like setting', 'Picnic areas', 'Charcoal Grills', 'Newer double pane windows', 'Intercom system', 'Programmable thermostat', 'Free WiFi provided by the community of Old Brooklyn', 'Laundry room on 1st floor of every building', 'Storage lockers available on first floor of every building for additional fee of $10 a month', 'Tenant pays gas and electricity.', 'Landlord pays water/sewer, garbage removal and snow removal.', 'Specials & Discounts available:', '$100, or 1/2 Deposit possible!', '*Pending credit approval', 'Pet Policy:', 'We happily accept cats at this location.', 'Unfortunately, NO DOGS.', ' No security deposit!', 'Just a $25 monthly cat rent :)', 'Our Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 8:00 am-5:00 pm', 'Saturday: 10:00 am - 4:00 pm', 'Sunday: Closed', 'Please contact us at', 'show contact info', 'at the leasing office for more information or to receive a virtual tour :)']
